```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
```

```{r}
data("rest_inspec")

rest_clean =
  rest_inspec %>%
  mutate(
    inspec_year = as.numeric(format(inspection_date, "%Y"))
  ) %>%
  filter(inspec_year == 2016) %>%
  select (boro, critical_flag, cuisine_description, inspection_date, inspec_year, score)
```
